title: Ms Gork Vote - Frontend Implementation Plan

requirements.summary: Display the voting question prominently on a black background
acceptanceCriteria: The question text is clearly visible and centered above the buttons
The exact question text matches: 'do you support the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired?'

file_operations.description: Add the voting question text with centered layout and ensure the background is black. Display the exact question: 'do you support the CR and getting Ms.Gork fired?' prominently above the voting buttons.
Set the body and root container background to black to ensure a consistent black screen appearance throughout the application.

requirements.summary: Render two voting buttons labeled 'yes' and 'no' below the question
acceptanceCriteria: Two buttons are displayed below the question
Buttons are clearly clickable and visually distinct from the black background

file_operations.description: Add two button elements labeled 'yes' and 'no' positioned below the question. Use high-contrast styling to ensure visibility against the black background. Wire the buttons to call the backend vote capability when clicked.

requirements.summary: Display the current vote counts for both 'yes' and 'no' responses after the user votes
acceptanceCriteria: After clicking either button, the vote counts become visible
The count for 'yes' votes is displayed
The count for 'no' votes is displayed
Vote counts update in real-time to reflect the user's vote

file_operations.description: Add state management to track whether the user has voted. After a vote is submitted, fetch and display the current vote counts for both 'yes' and 'no'. Show the counts in a visually clear format on the black background.
Create a custom hook to handle voting logic and fetching vote counts from the backend. The hook should call the backend vote capability and manage loading/error states.

requirements.summary: Apply a bold, striking visual design with high contrast against the black background
acceptanceCriteria: Visual elements have strong contrast against the black background
Typography and spacing create a dramatic, focused experience
Design feels cohesive and purposeful throughout the interface

file_operations.description: Define bold, high-contrast typography styles and spacing utilities that create a dramatic aesthetic. Use bright colors (white, red, or accent colors) for text and buttons to stand out against the black background.
Configure Tailwind theme to include custom colors, font sizes, and spacing that support a bold, impactful design system with strong contrast suitable for a voting interface.
